name: Come See My Hole
description:
Come See My Hole

Join up to 3 friends to stand around a hole and have a conversation, or just hang out and take in the sights and sounds of hole.

Find yourself an immersive and detailed world where you just stand around a hole.

Invite your friends on Discord and have a conversation with them.

Accept an invite on Discord from a complete stranger and have a conversation with them.

Conversation isn't the only thing you can do, make noises, play music, tell jokes, or just hang out in silence, Come See My Hole is your world!
